content: Hi! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you book an appointment today. Can I get your name to get started?
Thanks, Mike. Can you please provide the address where you need the service?
Thank you. What kind of service do you need help with: plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
It's for HVAC. My AC is not cooling much.
Got it—HVAC service for your AC. When would you like us to come by? Please let me know your preferred date and time.
Tomorrow morning would be good. How much will it cost though?
I'll check availability for tomorrow morning. As for pricing, I can get an estimate for you. Please note, final costs depend on the exact issue. Would you like a ballpark estimate?
Yeah just give me a rough idea. Don't wanna get a huge bill.

Of course, Mike! For an AC not cooling, service visits usually start around $89, plus any parts if needed. Larger repairs may cost more, but you'll get a full estimate from our technician before any work. Would you like to confirm your appointment for tomorrow morning?
Okay. Go ahead and book it. Tomorrow morning is fine.

Great, your HVAC appointment is set for tomorrow morning at 1527 Pine Street. You’ll receive a reminder before the visit. If you have questions or need to reschedule, reply here any time. We look forward to helping you, Mike!
